## Ed25519.convertPrivateKeyToX25519() method

Converts an Ed25519 private key to its X25519 counterpart.

Similar to the public key conversion, this method aids in transitioning from signing to encryption operations. By converting an Ed25519 private key to X25519 format, one can use the same key pair for both digital signatures and key exchange operations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static convertPrivateKeyToX25519(options: {
        privateKey: Uint8Array;
    }): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { privateKey: Uint8Array; } | The options for the conversion. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

A Promise that resolves to the X25519 private key as a Uint8Array.
